pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Change-Points via VIFCP Method // Contains a function to support the following paper: Xiaoping Shi, Xiang-Sheng Wang, Dongwei Wei, Yuehua Wu (2016), DOI:10.1007/s00180-015-0587-5, A sequential multiple change-point detection procedure via VIF regression, Computational Statistics, 31(2): 671-691.
